name: Color Breaker
description:
This game was made by Ikroth and Nuthen for a 72-hour Breakout gamejam hosted by GDL. The focus was on "juicing" the game, adding many effects to make gameplay more involved and interesting. Created the weekend of March 24, 2016 in LÖVE.

The .love download requires installation of LÖVE 0.10.1 found at https://love2d.org/
